title: HOW DID DR. PARET LEARN THE FASCINATION TECHNIQUE? / Q&A WITH DR. MARCO PARET
description:
This video is part of the Q&A series with Dr. Marco Paret, in which he answers your interesting questions. Dr. Paret searched techniques for many years, he met a lot of masters, and now he is willing to transmit to you what he knows. But how did he learn the technique of Fascination and to use the power of the gaze? This he is sharing in the video. Learn all of these powerful non-verbal hypnosis techniques in Dr. Marco Paret's school. Check our free course on www.mesmerism.info 

Dr. Marco Paret is the world's leading authority in Non-Verbal Hypnotism.

Subscribe to our YouTube channel for more free lessons and useful techniques:
